data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Nalanda, Bihar, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nalanda, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Nalanda. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 31,655 believers in Nalanda, Bihar, India a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Nalanda, Bihar, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Nalanda, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Nalanda, Bihar, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.section_summary:
the county of Nalanda, Bihar, India has a population of 2,877,700.

We estimate Nalanda has 31,655 people who might know Jesus, 34,916 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,811,129 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, move the 31,655 believers in the county of Nalanda to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."
